QuestData.Title: Goldtooth
QuestData.Description: I was playing near the Fargodeep Mine, and I think I dropped, er...I mean I saw, the old lady's necklace. Don't ask me how it got there...it wasn't me!$B$BWell anyway, I saw this big, gold-toothed kobold pick up the necklace and run back to his den above the mine. Go find that kobold and you'll find the necklace, I swear!
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Bernice's Necklace to "Auntie" Bernice Stonefield at the Stonefield Farm.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hello, $n. Have you found my necklace?
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, you found it! Thank you, thank you dear!$B$BHere, take this. It was my husband's and he always said it was lucky. If only he didn't forget it on his last campaign! *sniff*
